tool_description: RandomCreditCardAPI is a versatile API for generating random credit card numbers, allowing you to include a vendor or leave it blank based on your needs. It's a flexible solution for testing, development, and various applications that require random credit card data.
name: RandomCreditCardAPI
title: RandomCreditCardAPI

api_list.name: postPayment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://randomcreditcardapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/payment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "randomcreditcardapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://randomcreditcardapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/payment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
